# Pull Request

## Description
Please include a short description of the changes and the motivation behind them.

Related issue: # (if any)

---

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation only
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Chore / build

---

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the repository style (linted)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass
- [ ] I have updated documentation where required (README / CONTRIBUTING)
- [ ] No secrets were added

---

## Implementation notes / short checklist for reviewers
- What to test locally (quick steps)
- Any important files changed
- Any configuration or environment variables required for testing

---

## Commit message style (optional)
Using emoji + keyword in commit messages is optional in this repository. Git-hook validation was removed; the suggested format can help keep commits readable but is not required.
